title: Gd, i'm scared.
body:
4 outta 5 games into silver 5 played.

I've been dreaming about this since they reset ranks.

If i win this one i'm promoted. Loose and i'm probably at 20lp and bronze 1 again. omfg.


I'm also fourth pick which means i'm probably top or support. Meaning i'll have overall little impact.


Question: Am i going to win this. I've got a feedling i don't like at all.
